meanings.definition: Providing supplementary or additional help or support.
meanings.sent1: The auxiliary tools made the task easier.
meanings.sent2: She used an auxiliary light to brighten the room.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the auxiliary toy was a new friend.
meanings.sent4: His smile was like an auxiliary sun on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The colorful umbrella acted as an auxiliary shield against the rain.

meanings.definition: A person or thing providing supplementary or additional help or support.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic's assistant was an excellent auxiliary.
meanings.sent2: An auxiliary can be a valuable asset in times of need.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel saw the bird feeder as an auxiliary buffet.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was an auxiliary melody in the room.
meanings.sent5: The flashlight became his trusty auxiliary during the blackout.
